tweet: Ouroboros is the Proof-of-Stake algorithm designed and researched for Cardano. It takes into account security, randomness, incentive/reward mechanisms, while eliminating the need for an energy-hungry proof of work protocol. Read more in this IBT article:  https://t.co/ySushSDh84
